notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: L.G.N., N.S., Z.M., and G.S. designed the research, N.S., Z.M., and B.K. carried out wood-colonization assays and extractions, B.B. performed RNA-Seq analyses, R.A.O. performed proteomics analyses, N.S., Z.M., B.B., and R.A.O. performed comparative analyses and bioinformatics. L.G.N., N.S., and R.A.O. interpreted the results and wrote the paper. All authors have read and commented on the manuscript.
